instance_template: seminar(1..10). topic("AI"; "Bio"; "Math"; "Chem"). day(1; 2). timeslot("morning"; "late morning"; "early afternoon"; "late afternoon"). room(1..5). follows("morning","late morning";"late morning", "early afternoon";"early afternoon", "late afternoon"). -projector(R) :- room(R), R = 5. firstSession("morning", 1). lastSession("late afternoon", 2).
generator: 1{topicOf(S, T): topic(T)}1 :- seminar(S). 1{delivered(S, R, T, D) : room(R), timeslot(T), day(D)} :- seminar(S).

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: we can't have two seminars fighting for the same room at the same time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, T, D), delivered(S2, R, T, D), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: Each room is capped at two sessions per day so we don't burn out the facilities.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: {delivered(S, R, T, D) : seminar(S), timeslot(T)}2 :- room(R), day(D).

hard_constraints.description: No back-to-back bookings. Each room needs a breather between sessions.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(_, R, T1, _), delivered(_, R, T2, _), follows(T1, T2).

hard_constraints.description: Room 3 goes dark once the afternoon hits, so nothing can be scheduled there then.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(_, R, T, _), R = 3, T = "early afternoon"; T = "late afternoon".

hard_constraints.description: AI and Math need a projector, and Room 5 is a dead zone for tech. Keep them out of there.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S, R, _, _), topicOf(S, "AI"), -projector(R). :- delivered(S, R, _, _), topicOf(S, "Math"), -projector(R).

hard_constraints.description: The AI crowd only works mornings. No AI seminars allowed in the afternoon slots.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S, _, T, _), topicOf(S, "AI"), T != "morning", T != "late morning".

hard_constraints.description: Bio needs to be spread out. It's gotta show up on both days of the symposium.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: hasBio(D) :- delivered(S, _, _, D), topicOf(S, "Bio"). :- day(D), not hasBio(D).

hard_constraints.description: We can't handle multiple Bio talks at once. Keep them on separate time slots.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, _, T, D), delivered(S2, _, T, D), S1 != S2, topicOf(S1, "Bio"), topicOf(S2, "Bio").

hard_constraints.description: Chemistry talks are solitary. No room can host more than one Chem session for the whole event.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, _, _), delivered(S2, R, _, _), S1 != S2, topicOf(S1, "Chem"), topicOf(S2, "Chem").

hard_constraints.description: Gotta bookend the show with Math. The very first and very last sessions must be Math talks.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1{delivered(S, R, T, D): room(R), firstSession(T, D), topicOf(S, "Math")}. 1{delivered(S, R, T, D): room(R), lastSession(T, D), topicOf(S, "Math")}.

hard_constraints.description: Keep the total number of slots where Bio and Chem overlap to a maximum of two.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: overlap(T, D) :- delivered(S1, _, T, D), delivered(S2, _, T, D), topicOf(S1, "Bio"), topicOf(S2, "Chem"). { overlap(T, D) : timeslot(T), day(D) }2.

hard_constraints.description: Bio and Chem don't mix in the same room on the same day. Keep them separated.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, _, D), delivered(S2, R, _, D), topicOf(S1, "Chem"), topicOf(S2, "Bio").

soft_constraints.description: Don't leave rooms sitting empty. We want to minimize wasted slots across the schedule.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: wastedSlot(R, T, D) :- not delivered(_, R, T, D), room(R), timeslot(T), day(D). wastedSlots(N) :- #count{R, T, D: wastedSlot(R, T, D)} = N. #minimize{N: wastedSlots(N)}.

soft_constraints.description: Variety is key. Try to pack as many unique topics into every time slot as possible.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: hasTopic(To, T, D) :- delivered(S, _, T, D), topicOf(S, To). topicsPerSlot(N, T, D) :- #count{To: hasTopic(To, T, D)} = N, timeslot(T), day(D). #maximize{N: topicsPerSlot(N, T, D)}.
